content: प्रतिबंधः {@--1@} Binding or tying to. {@--2@} Obstruction, impediment, obstacle; स तपःप्रतिबंधमन्युना <ls>R. 8. 80</ls>; <ls>Mv. 5. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Opposition, resistance. {@--4@} Investment, blockade, siege. {@--5@} Connection. {@--6@} Cessation. {@--7@} Disappointment. {@--8@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) Invariable and inseparable connection.
